original_text: He did what was evil in the sight of the Lord, as the house of Ahab had done. For after the death of his father they were his counselors, to his undoing.
korean_text: 그의 아버지가 죽은 후에 그가 패망하게 하는 아합의 집의 가르침을 따라 여호와 보시기에 아합의 집 같이 악을 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: He did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주의 보시기에 악한 일을 행하였으니

sentences.original_text: as the house of Ahab had done.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 아합의 집이 행한 것 같았더라.

sentences.original_text: For after the death of his father they were his counselors
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그의 아버지가 죽은 후에 그들이 그의 모사가 되었으니
